summary:
Currently working as a Mechanical Engineer in ASML to control the internal environment of EUV machine and infrastructure design. 

Previously worked as a Professional Doctorate in Engineering (PDEng) researcher in University of Twente, Netherland. PDEng is a post master's research work which is mainly based on practical assignment and highly concentrated on design work. During the PDEng research, I gain experience related to project management, design methodology, Finite Element Method (FEM) calculation, FEM numerical simulation and systematic design approach. Moreover, the research work builds a bridge in between theoretical knowledge and practical implementation of analytical knowledge.   My research is run by Nonlinear Solid Mechanics group in UTwente and a company MAATS.

Earlier studied my master's study in Technical University of Dresden (TU Dresden), Germany, on Computational and Structural Engineering (named ACCESS). During the study, I learned computational methods in engineering and numerical simulation experience of different structural engineering. My engineering life started through the Bachelor studies in Bangladesh University of Eng and Tech (BUET),  in Bangladesh, adopting Structural Engineering as a major subject. 

Career goal: A position that requires analytical reasoning and creativity, where I can apply my academic knowledge effectively and efficiently. I am passionate about programming, design analyzing and improving, FEM calculation, FEM simulation and working with a new & challenging assignment. It is appealing for me to work in a friendly environment. Future goal is to establish me as an effective, professional and suitable engineer.

Key Skills: Experienced with
-  FEM calculation
- FEM analysis by ANSYS & ABAQUS
- 3D plasticity modeling by MATLAB, FORTRAN & FEAP
- 2D & 3D drawing software like SolidWorks, AUTOCAD

treasury_media.title: Postdocs, PhD's and PDEng's | Harun (M.A.) MSc. | Department MS3
treasury_media.description: My PDEng project is run by MAATS, gas pipeline construction company. According to cold-bending process, it is difficult to bend a 4-5 ft diameter pipe with steel grade X80 or X100 without any physical damage. It will be convenient to reduce the bending moment by 20 - 30% with high internal pressure. Developing a technique, that will be able to apply high internal presssure, is also challenging.

profile_positions.description: As a lead designer, I am responsible to manage other designers, deliver the safe design, align with supplier and make sure producable design of the Vacuum System infrastructure part. Thos hardware will create internal vacuum chamber and monitor the quality of the vacuum (24/7). My responsibility is to design the mechanical component of new machine EXE + NXE. More specifically, our team is responsible to create the vacuum sustem of NXE + EXE machine, to control the internal machine environment during operation, design different leaktesting of gas & liquid system. Hence, I should consider the thermal calculation, air pressure drop calculation and steady flow of gas. Designing the pumps, connect them in vacuum chamber, functional block diagram (FBD) for vacuum system, harware design from sketch to final hardware deliverable. To make a feasible and reliable design, I have to lead the design team who will go through all design steps.
profile_positions.title: Lead Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description: As a design engineer, I am responsible to design the infrastructure which will control the internal environment of EXE machine. My responsibility is to design the mechanical component of new machine. More specifically, our group is responsible to create the vacuum sustem of EXE machine, to control the internal machine environment during operation, design different leak-tight gas & liquid system. Hence, I should consider the thermal calculation, air pressure drop calculation and steady flow of water. Designing the pumps, connect them in vacuum chamber, functional block diagram (FBD) for vacuum system, mechanical layout for gas supply, mechanical equipment for gas monitoring are my responsibilities. To make a feasible and reliable design, I have to design those equipment using NX, communicate with suppliers & other groups, perform different experimental tests, numerical simulation and report documentation.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
My PDEng project is: "Reduce bending moment of high-strength and large-diameter steel pipe". 

For gas pipeline construction, high-strength steel pipe is used; such as X80 or X100 grade. For a large amount of gas transportation, the dimension of these pipes are large; such as diameter 48"~60" and wall-thickness 0.5"~1.5".  Those pipes are bent by a hydraulic bending machine. Bending of these thin-walled pipes is very difficult due to different physical damage; such as buckling, ovality, eccentricity and wrinkling. 

The aim of my project is:
- A prototype test in the laboratory with small pressure
- Numerical simulation of high-strength steel pipe with high internal pressure by ANSYS Workbench
- Numerical calculation to determine the relationship between different parameters
- 3D plasticity modeling by MATLAB programming
- Finding different ideas and discuss with stakeholder's
- Choose a solution and perform analytical and numerical simulation by ABAQUS
- Make a design proposal for the technical solution

Results: High-amount of internal pressure will reduce the bending moment by 20~30%. Additionally, the solution will work with the existing system and it will save the machine and the reduce operation time.
profile_positions.title: Professional Doctorate in Engineering (PDEng)

volunteer_experiences.description: Badhan is a volunteer blood donating organization in Bangladesh. All members are in the University level students, who donate and arrange blood for patients. I worked for BADHAN from 2007 to 2012 as a member during my bachelor study. Still connected with Badhan as an advisor.
